name: Brave New World (LizIsMe)
description:
(In development)

"For decades, in the Mainland, mentioning the name God was considered taboo.

There were were the gods were idolized. until one day, one of them rebelled, opening the gates of the Dark World. In his incessant quest for power, he was defeated by the other Gods and sealed for all eternity.

Today, few people still remember the word "God" and even they avoid mentioning it at all costs, but everything changed when a strange island emerged in the border seas of Mainland and Roxel.

In the early days of its discovery, thousands of people simply disappeared. Some have left letters mentioning "to have spoken to God", others simply disappeared.

The fear of a new era of fear was high. Something needed to be done..."
